select t.*,t1.title,t1.address,t1.starttime,t1.id 'trainid', (select min(starttime) FROM whg_tra_course where state=1 and traid= t1.id) as 'coursestarttime' from whg_tra_enrol t, whg_tra t1 WHERE t.traid = t1.id
AND t1.endtime >= NOW()
AND t1.endtime <= NOW()
and t.userid = #{userid}
order by t.crttime desc
SELECT count(*) FROM whg_tra t1 , whg_tra_enrol t2 WHERE t1.id = t2.traid and t2.state IN (1,4,6) and t2.userid = #{userId} AND t1.starttime > #{myDate}

SELECT count(*) FROM whg_tra_enrol e1, whg_tra_course c1 WHERE e1.traid = c1.traid AND e1.userid = #{userid} AND e1.state IN (1, 4, 6) AND c1.starttime > #{now} AND ((#{starttime} < c1.starttime AND c1.starttime < #{endtime} AND #{endtime} < c1.endtime) OR (c1.starttime < #{starttime} AND #{starttime} < c1.endtime AND c1.endtime < #{endtime}) OR (#{starttime} >= c1.starttime AND #{endtime} <= c1.endtime) OR (#{starttime} <= c1.starttime AND #{endtime} >= c1.endtime));

SELECT e.id 'enrolid', e.userid, c.*, ec.sign FROM whg_tra_enrol e INNER JOIN whg_tra_course c ON e.traid = c.traid LEFT JOIN whg_tra_enrol_course ec ON c.id = ec.courseid AND ec.userid = #{userid} WHERE e.traid = #{traid} AND e.userid = #{userid}
